import React, {Component} from 'react'; class ToDo extends Component { state={ data:[ {id:1,name:"NodeJs and express"}, {id:2,name:"NodeJs and express"}, {id:3,name:"NodeJs and express"}, {id:4,name:"NodeJs and express"}, ] }; render() { return (

To Do List App

{this.state.data.map( d => )}
{d.name}

Total Task: {this.state.data.length}

); } } export default ToDo;
